People may say that this is the worst game of all the Counter Strike series but i dont think that way. May complain about biggest head hitbox. May complain of movement and spray patterns. I'd say that this is a pretty damn good game.
Gameplay is fun and enjoyable.
Map design is good, and you can have fun with the physics.
Community is good, tho if you are on an european servers you might find only russians.
Fun gamemodes. Personal best is zombie escape. The gameplay of that mode is just incredible. Its not as in 1.6 that zombies would have some sort of special power. Map design of that gamemode is great.
Graphics are realistic enough. Weapon damage is balanced. Pity that this game is dying, also like CS Classic, over CSGO. And now it being free to play...
